black.install_steps: pip install setuptools==68.0.0; pip install -r test_requirements.txt; pip install click==8.0.2; pip install pytest==6.2.5; pip install -e .[d]

cookiecutter.install_steps: pip install -r test_requirements.txt; python setup.py install

pandas.install_steps: pip install --upgrade setuptools; pip install numpy==1.16.0; pip install cython==0.29.36; pip install pytz python-dateutil nose py pytest; make clean; make develop

scrapy.install_steps: pip install pytest; pip install twisted[tls]; pip install -r requirements-py3.txt; pip install .

spaCy.install_steps: pip install -U pip setuptools wheel; pip install -r requirements.txt --default-timeout=100; pip install Cython==0.29.22; pip install attrs==19.1.0; pip install --no-build-isolation --editable .

numpy.install_steps: git submodule update --init; pip install -r test_requirements.txt; python setup.py build_ext --inplace -j 4

poetry.install_steps: pipx install poetry==1.2.0 --force; poetry env use python3.8; poetry install

freqtrade.install_steps: pip install arrow numpy; sudo wget -c http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/ta-lib/ta-lib-0.4.0-src.tar.gz; tar -xzf ta-lib-0.4.0-src.tar.gz; cd ta-lib && ./configure --prefix=/usr && make && sudo make install ; pip install TA-Lib; pip install --upgrade pip wheel; export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${HOME}/dependencies/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH; export TA_LIBRARY_PATH=${HOME}/dependencies/lib; export TA_INCLUDE_PATH=${HOME}/dependencies/include; pip install -r requirements-dev.txt; pip install -e .

jax.install_steps: pip install numpy wheel build; python3 build/build.py; pip install dist/*.whl; pip install -e .; pip install -r build/test-requirements.txt; rm dist/*
